证据片段: The influence of texture on the yield stress of Zircaloy-4 tension specimens diminishes rapidly above 500°C

证据片段: Table 1 shows that for this batch of tube the anisotropic factors change with stress relief (above 500°C)

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_031_chunk1
证据片段: Transient-heating tube-burst tests were conducted on a 50.8-cm length of Zircaloy cladding obtained from spent-fuel rods irradiated in the H. B. Robinson power reactor to a peak burn-up of 30 MWD/kg

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_031_chunk1
证据片段: Internal electrical resistance heaters were used to achieve nominal heating rates of 28°C/s for the tests

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_031_chunk1
证据片段: The tests were conducted in steam

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_031_chunk1
证据片段: Tube burst pressures varied from 0.965 to 12.514 MPa

文献ID: STP681-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_4th Volume_031_chunk1
证据片段: No significant difference in burst behavior between unirradiated and spent nuclear fuel Zircaloy cladding was observed experimentally
